text: The 2004 NFL Europe season was the 12th season in 14 years of the American Football league that started out as the World League of American Football. The Cologne Centurions replaced the FC Barcelona Dragons for the 2004 season. ==World Bowl XII== Berlin 30–24 Frankfurt Saturday, June 12, 2004 Arena AufSchalke Gelsenkirchen, Germany Category:2004 in American football Category:NFL Europe (WLAF) seasons
title: 2004 NFL Europe season
